verbose_text: To further verify that Cbl-b negatively regulates GATA3 via Stat6, WT and Cblb -/- CD4 + T cells were retrovirally infected with GATA3 and stimulated with anti-CD3 and anti-CD28 in the presence of anti-iL-4, which blocks IL-4 / Stat6 signaling.
evidence: negatively regulates GATA3 via Stat6, WT and Cblb -/-  CD4 +  T cells were retrovirally infected with GATA3 and stimulated with anti-CD3
